channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- Orion Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- Orion Platform

item.title: CVE-2021-35213|2024-09-16T20:26:26.768Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: An Improper Access Control Privilege Escalation Vulnerability was discovered in the User Setting of Orion Platform version 2020.2.5. It allows a guest user to elevate privileges to the Administrator using this vulnerability. Authentication is required to exploit the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-35217|2024-09-16T20:58:13.615Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insecure Deseralization of untrusted data remote code execution vulnerability was discovered in Patch Manager Orion Platform Integration module and reported to us by ZDI. An Authenticated Attacker could exploit it by executing WSAsyncExecuteTasks deserialization of untrusted data.

item.title: CVE-2022-36961|2024-09-16T20:31:16.687Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: A vulnerable component of Orion Platform was vulnerable to SQL Injection, an authenticated attacker could leverage this for privilege escalation or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-35215|2024-09-16T19:52:15.792Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insecure deserialization leading to Remote Code Execution was detected in the Orion Platform version 2020.2.5. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-10148|2024-09-16T17:28:03.664Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Orion API is vulnerable to an authentication bypass that could allow a remote attacker to execute API commands. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and execute API commands which may result in a compromise of the SolarWinds instance. SolarWinds Orion Platform versions 2019.4 HF 5, 2020.2 with no hotfix installed, and 2020.2 HF 1 are affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-36965|2024-09-16T17:43:11.219Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insufficient sanitization of inputs in QoE application input field could lead to stored and Dom based XSS attack. This issue is fixed and released in SolarWinds Platform (2022.3.0).
